column2: Optimize images and enable caching to reduce load time by 40%
Create unique meta descriptions for all pages to improve SEO
Fix layout issues on mobile devices for better user experience
Break up long paragraphs and use more headings
Place prominent CTAs above the fold to increase conversions

column1: Add descriptive alt text to all images
Combine files and use sprite sheets
Move inline styles to external CSS files
Add async or defer attributes to scripts
Implement browser caching with Cache-Control headers
